long_description: The Orb massage ball from PRO-TEC helps you massage target areas, reducing muscle fatigue and tightness. It's perfect for post-workout use. 5 in. high-density EVA foam ball lets you get an aggressive deep-tissue massage by using your body weight for pressure while rolling it in small circles on target areas. Works great on IT band, hamstring, quadriceps, calf and more.
short_description: The Orb massage ball from PRO-TEC helps you massage target areas, reducing muscle fatigue and tightness. It's perfect for post-workout use.
